description: The WwanCloseHandle function closes a handle to the mobile broadband service.
return_value: Returns ERROR_SUCCESS if the operation was successful; otherwise, an error value.
name: WwanCloseHandle

arguments.name: hClientHandle
arguments.description: A handle to the mobile broadband service that WwanOpenHandle returned.

description: The WwanEnumerateInterfaces function enumerates all of the mobile broadband interfaces currently enabled on the local computer.
return_value: Returns ERROR_SUCCESS if the operation was successful; otherwise, an error value.
name: WwanEnumerateInterfaces

arguments.name: hClientHandle
arguments.description: The client's session handle that was obtained by a previous call to WwanOpenHandle.

arguments.name: *pdwReserved
arguments.description: Reserved for future use. This pointer must be NULL.

arguments.name: **ppInterfaceList
arguments.description: A pointer to a memory block that receives an array of mobile broadband interfaces in a  WWAN_INTERFACE_INFO_LIST structure.  The memory block for the WWAN_INTERFACE_INFO_LIST returned is allocated by WwanEnumerateInterfaces if the call succeeds.

description: The WwanFreeMemory function frees a block of memory.
name: WwanFreeMemory

arguments.name: pMem
arguments.description: A pointer to the memory block to free.

description: The WwanOpenHandle function opens a connection to the server.
return_value: Returns ERROR_SUCCESS if the operation was successful; otherwise, an error value.
name: WwanOpenHandle

arguments.name: dwClientVersion
arguments.description: A 32-bit value that specifies the requested version of the wireless wide area network (WWAN) API.

arguments.name: *pdwNegotiatedVersion
arguments.description: A pointer to a variable that receives a 32-bit value that specifies the negotiated version of the WWAN API.

arguments.name: *phClientHandle
arguments.description: A pointer to a variable that receives a handle for the client to use in this session. This handle is used by other functions throughout the session.

description: The WwanQueryInterface function queries the mobile broadband service for info about a mobile broadband interface.
return_value: Returns ERROR_SUCCESS if the operation was successful; otherwise, an error value.
name: WwanQueryInterface

arguments.name: hClientHandle
arguments.description: The client's session handle that was obtained by a previous call to the WwanOpenHandle function.

arguments.name: *pInterfaceGuid
arguments.description: A pointer to the GUID of the interface to be queried.

arguments.name: opCode
arguments.description: The wireless wide area network (WWAN) interface operational code to query about. Only this  value is valid:  ValueMeaning  WwanIntfOpcodeInterfaceObject   Returns interface info.

arguments.name: *pReserved
arguments.description: Reserved for future use. This pointer must be NULL.

arguments.name: *pdwDataSize
arguments.description: A pointer to a variable that receives a 32-bit value that specifies the size of the data returned.

arguments.name: **ppData
arguments.description: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the data returned.

arguments.name: *pRequestId
arguments.description: A pointer to a variable that receives a request ID for the query.

arguments.name: *pStatus
arguments.description: A pointer to a variable that receives a status value for the query operation. Here are possible values.  WWAN_STATUS_SUCCESS (STATUS_SUCCESS) WWAN_STATUS_BUSY (0xC0040002) WWAN_STATUS_FAILURE (0xC0040003) WWAN_STATUS_SIM_NOT_INSERTED (0xC0040004) WWAN_STATUS_BAD_SIM (0xC0040005) WWAN_STATUS_PIN_REQUIRED (0xC0040006) WWAN_STATUS_PIN_DISABLED (0xC0040007) WWAN_STATUS_NOT_REGISTERED (0xC0040008) WWAN_STATUS_PROVIDERS_NOT_FOUND (0xC0040009) WWAN_STATUS_NO_DEVICE_SUPPORT (0xC004000a) WWAN_STATUS_PROVIDER_NOT_VISIBLE (0xC004000b) WWAN_STATUS_DATA_CLASS_NOT_AVAILABLE (0xC004000c) WWAN_STATUS_PACKET_SVC_DETACHED (0xC004000d) WWAN_STATUS_MAX_ACTIVATED_CONTEXTS (0xC004000e) WWAN_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED (0xC004000f) WWAN_STATUS_VOICE_CALL_IN_PROGRESS (0xC0040010) WWAN_STATUS_CONTEXT_NOT_ACTIVATED (0xC0040011) WWAN_STATUS_SERVICE_NOT_ACTIVATED (0xC0040012) WWAN_STATUS_INVALID_ACCESS_STRING (0xC0040013) WWAN_STATUS_INVALID_USER_NAME_PWD (0xC0040014) WWAN_STATUS_RADIO_POWER_OFF (0xC0040015) WWAN_STATUS_INVALID_PARAMETERS (0xC0040016) WWAN_STATUS_READ_FAILURE (0xC0040017) WWAN_STATUS_WRITE_FAILURE (0xC0040018) WWAN_STATUS_DENIED_POLICY (0xC0040019) WWAN_STATUS_INVALID_DEVICE_SERVICE_OPERATION (0xC004001a) WWAN_STATUS_MORE_DATA (0xC004001b)
